questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

class A {
public:
    virtual void display() {
        cout << "A";
    }
};

class B : public A {
public:
    void display() override {
        cout << "B";
    }
};

int main() {
    A* ptr = new B;
    ptr->display();
    delete ptr;
    return 0;
}

What will be the output of the following code?

int x = 10;
int y = 5;
int result = x-- - --y;
cout << result;
return 0;

What is the output of the following code?

class Base {
public:
    Base() {
        cout << "Base ";
    }
};

class Derived : public Base {
public:
    Derived() {
        cout << "Derived ";
    }
};

int main() {
    Derived d;
    return 0;
}

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int* ptr = &x;
*ptr = 7;

What will be the output of the following program?

class A {
public:
    virtual void print() {
        cout << "A";
    }
};

class B : public A {
public:
    void print() override {
        cout << "B";
    }
};

int main() {
    A obj;
    A* ptr = &obj;
    B* bptr = dynamic_cast(ptr);
    if (bptr) {
        bptr->print();
    } else {
        cout << "C";
    }
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

class Base {
public:
    virtual void print() {
        cout << "Base";
    }
};

class Derived : public Base {
public:
    void print() override {
        cout << "Derived";
    }
};

int main() {
    Derived d;
    Base* ptr = &d;
    ptr->print();
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 10;
do {
    cout << x << " ";
} while (x++);

What will be the output of the following code?

int x = 1;
while (x < 5) {
    cout << x << " ";
    x *= 2;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int x = 3;
while (--x > 0) {
    cout << x;
}

What is the output of the following program?

for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
    if (i % 2 == 0) {
        continue;
    }
    cout << i << " ";
}
return 0;

What will be the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int& ref = x;
ref = 10;

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 0;
do {
    cout << x << " ";
} while (x += 2);

What is the output of the following code?

class A {
public:
    void display() {
        cout << "A";
    }
};

class B : public A {
public:
    void display() {
        cout << "B";
    }
};

int main() {
    A obj;
    B* bptr = dynamic_cast(&obj);
    if (bptr) {
        bptr->display();
    } else {
        cout << "C";
    }
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 0;
do {
    x++;
} while (x++ < 5);
cout << x;

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 7;
int y = 4;
int* ptr = &x;
x = *ptr + y;

What will be the output of the following code?

int x = 5;
while (x) {
    cout << x-- << " ";
    if (x == 3)
        break;
}

What is the output of the following program?

int x = 10;
do {
    cout << x;
} while (--x);

What is the value of "x" after the execution of the following code?

int x = 5;
int& ref = x;
x = 3;
ref = 7;

What will be the output of the following program?

for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
    if (i == 2) {
        break;
    }
    cout << i << " ";
}
return 0;

What is the output of the following code?

int x = 2;
do {
    cout << x;
    x--;
} while (x >= 0);
